Class PopupController

java.lang.Object
WelcomeController
WordleController
PopupController
public class PopupController
extends WordleController
class popupController is the controller that creates the window after each round is made
Author:
Samuel Nicklaus

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static java.lang.String answer
    string that contains the answer to the round
    private static int attempt
    the amount of attempts the user finished the round in
    private javafx.scene.control.Button button
    button that is used to go to either the next round or back to the home screen
    private static boolean correctBool
    boolean that tells up if the user got the answer correct or not
    private javafx.scene.text.Text correctWord
    is the textbox that contains the correct word
    private static java.lang.Boolean finish
    boolean that tells us if the game is over or not
    private javafx.scene.text.Text popupText
    text that is displayed to the user

  • Method Details

    • nextRound

      void nextRound​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      is a method that checks if there is another round to be played. If so it will start the next round else it will send user back to home screen
      Parameters:
      event - button press
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if fxml file is not found

    • setTextFunc

      public static void setTextFunc​(int attempts, boolean finished, java.lang.String correctAns, boolean correct)
      helper function that takes in data from WordleController
      Parameters:
      attempts - is the # of attempts it took to guess the word
      finished - is a boolean that tells us if the user has played 5 rounds
      correctAns - is a string containing the correct answer to the round
      correct - is a boolean that tells us if the user got the answer correct
      See Also:
      WordleController

    • initialize

      void initialize()
      Description copied from class: WordleController
      This method is called by the FXMLLoader when initialization is complete
      Overrides:
      initialize in class WordleController
